comment: Thank you for your review of Finding Nemo! It's a beautiful tale indeed.
Glad you found Borat entertaining. We aimed for something different.
Glad you enjoyed The Shawshank Redemption. It's a film close to my heart.
Thanks for appreciating the complexity of Inception. It was a challenge to craft!
Glad you enjoyed Pulp Fiction's unique style. It was a blast to create!
Thanks for your love for The Godfather. It's a timeless classic.
